revision.text:
[[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm|Farms]] with at least one fully ripe [[Berries|Berry]] can attract '''Wandering Pokémon''' that are automatically caught without the use of a [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. Which Wandering Pokémon is attracted is based on Berry type and the farthest [[Regions|region]] you have progressed to, with all valid options having an equal chance to be encountered. Some Berries attract rare [[List_of_Obtainable_Pokémon|Pokémon]] that can be used strategically to complete a region's Pokédex. Wandering Pokémon also have a Base 1/1024 chance to be [[Shiny Chance|shiny]]. Attracting a shiny Wandering Pokémon when there is at least one open plot on the Farm plants a [[File:Starf.png|20px]] [[Starf|Starf Berry]] in that open plot. The Wanderers that are attracted by any berry (base wanderers) don't get [[Pokérus|EVs]] when wandering to the farm. ===Table of Wandering Pokémon=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pokémon !! \colorbox{White}{$ \text{Encounter Chance} = \frac{\text{Attract Aura}*\text{Ripe Berries}}{2000} $}     \colorbox{White}{$ \text{Attract Aura}^{1} = {1.03}^\text{Number of Roseli}*{1.03}^\text{Number of Roseli Affected by Lum} $}
\colorbox{White}{$^{1}$} Attract Aura formula assumes fully grown Roseli and Lum
The base chance to encounter a Wandering Pokémon is 1/2000 every 1.5 seconds for every fully ripe Berry. [[File:Roseli.png|30px]][[Roseli|Roseli Berries]] have an Attract Aura that can multiplicatively increase this chance for all currently grown Berries on the [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]]. Below are some examples illustrating how to improve your odds of encountering Wandering Pokémon. * Example 1: You have 1 fully grown [[File:Cheri.png|20px]][[Cheri|Cheri Berry]] when your highest region is [[Johto]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/2000 or 0.05% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, or [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross. * Example 2: You have 25 fully grown [[File:Cheri.png|20px]][[Cheri|Cheri Berries]] when your highest region is [[Johto]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/80 or 1.25% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, or [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross. * Example 3: You have 25 fully grown [[File:Liechi.png|20px]] [[Liechi|Liechi Berries]] when your highest region is [[Sinnoh]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/80 or 1.25% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise, [[File:Burmy.png|30px]]Burmy (plant), [[File:Combee.png|30px]]Combee, [[File:Cherubi.png|30px]]Cherubi, [[File:Munchlax.png|30px]]Munchlax, or [[File:Manaphy.png|30px]]Manaphy. * Example 4: You have a fully grown [[Starf#Roseli + Lum Setup|Roseli + Lum Setup for Starf Berry]] when your highest region is [[Hoenn]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds on the 20 [[File:Roseli.png|30px]][[Roseli]] plots, you have a ~3.26% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise, or [[File:Togepi.png|30px]]Togepi. :- Every 1.5 seconds on the 4 [[File:Lum.png|20px]] [[Lum]] plots, you have a ~0.65% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, or [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise. :- In total, this means you have a ~3.91% chance of encountering a Wandering Pokémon every 1.5 second interval. For an efficient farming setup to maximize wandering Pokémon chance, see the [[Farming Setups#Maximizing_Wanderer_Chance|Farming Setups page]] [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]
